description: Storage adapters for Postgres + pgvector and object stores to persist findings, checkpoints, and artifacts securely.
steps: Design schema for findings, scans, tasks, and checkpoints that supports auditability
Implement Postgres adapters with connection pooling and migrations
Integrate pgvector for embedding-assisted triage and similarity searches
Store large artifacts (captures, PCAPs) in an object store and reference them via signed, time-limited URLs
Add retention policies and backups to satisfy compliance
acceptance_criteria: Findings and checkpoints are durable across restarts
Artifacts remain accessible via signed URLs that still require OAuth tokens
pgvector indexes can power similar findings retrieval
